dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1882 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits.

section.header: Extension of parity for exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 132(f) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2015.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to months after December 31, 2013.
